Centesimal.description: Monetary amount in a string representation with an optional leading "-" for negative numbers. Integer and fractional parts are separated with a dot.Maximum allowed precision (total number of digits) is 30 String format is used to prevent loss of precision.

VerifyApi.description: Checks whether token is registered and checks person api access. If you don't have a token, use registration endpoints.
VerifyApi.name: token

VerifyDashboard.description: Checks whether token is registered and checks person dashboard access. If you don't have a token, use registration endpoints.
VerifyDashboard.name: token
